org.lafayette.server.nonce
Class BaseNonce

java.lang.Object
  org.lafayette.server.nonce.BaseNonce
All Implemented Interfaces:
Nonce
Direct Known Subclasses:
Sha1
abstract class BaseNonce
extends Object
implements Nonce

Base common implementation for nonce generators.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

isValid

public boolean isValid(String nonce)
Description copied from interface: Nonce
Verify if a NONCE is valid. A NONCE is valid if it was issued by this generator and not invalidated yet.

Specified by:
isValid in interface Nonce
Parameters:
nonce - NONCE to verify
Returns:
true if valid, else false
